$eref.description: A2A Policy creation input.

___onlineReplicationStartTime.description: The scheduled start time for the initial replication. If this parameter is Null, the initial replication starts immediately.

___recoveryPointHistoryDuration.description: The duration (in hours) to which point the recovery history needs to be maintained.

___storageAccounts.description: The list of storage accounts to which the VMs in the primary cloud can replicate to.

___applicationConsistentSnapshotFrequenc.description: The interval (in hours) at which Hyper-V Replica should create an application consistent snapshot within the VM.

___replicationPort.description: A value indicating the recovery HTTPS port.

___allowedAuthenticationType.description: A value indicating the authentication type.

___onlineReplicationStartTime.description: A value indicating the online IR start time.

___compression.description: A value indicating whether compression has to be enabled.

___offlineReplicationImportPath.description: A value indicating the offline IR import path.

___replicaDeletion.description: A value indicating whether the VM has to be auto deleted.

___initialReplicationMethod.description: A value indicating whether IR is online.

___replicationFrequencyInSeconds.description: A value indicating the replication interval.

___recoveryPoints.description: A value indicating the number of recovery points.

___applicationConsistentSnapshotFrequenc.description: A value indicating the application consistent frequency.

___offlineReplicationExportPath.description: A value indicating the offline IR export path.
